differential.translation[0].definitions[: a difference between things, especially between the wages of people doing different types of jobs in the same industry or profession
differential.translation[1].definitions[: based on or depending on a difference
differential treatment of part-time and full-time staff
differential.translation[2].definitions[: the amount of difference that there is between two things
There is a severe differential in the quality of jobs between the north and south of the country.
differential.translation[3].definitions[: based on or depending on a difference between two things
The change in the exchange rate over a period will equal the differential inflation rates between the two countries.
